input.sentences: i had a great time camping last weekend .
i lot of my friends were able to come .
when we got to the camp site we made camp quickly .
at night we all had out own tents to sleep in .
output.sentences: It was a beautiful weekend so the man wanted to have a bit of fun while camping.
He invited one of his friends to come along for a great time.
It was a long drive there on an empty gravel road with little to see.
Once they arrived at the camp site, they quickly set up a small fire and more friends began to gather around.
After a fun-filled day, they all went to sleep under the stars in their cozy tents.
